caption:
Thanks to all of you for sharing so many #ShowUsYourPass with us! We’re very excited to celebrate #Canada150 with all of you this year in our 47 national parks, 4 marine national parks and 171 national historic sites. What a blast! 🎉 
Special mentions go to @discovercharlottetown @maritime_overland @onemamareads @fatimaova @sarahjeanslife @dblakedickson @joko1101 @julzares @emm_provost 
#Canada #Canada150 #ParksCanada #DiscoveryPass #ExploreCanada
